name: gainfully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that provides money or something else that is useful: gainfully employed His estate continues to keep lawyers gainfully employed even seven years after his death. She left the theatre feeling that two hours had been gainfully spent. See
gainful
More examplesFewer examplesWith two daughters now living independently, I need to fill my time gainfully From the hotel you can walk gainfully in any direction.They are cutting back on staff as they feel the money could be more gainfully spent.
